title: 2015-10-15: Hitachi ABB HVDC Technologies, Ltd. commences business operations for HVDC in Japan (ABB Ltd) ...
text: ( Source : ABB Ltd) Tokyo , October 15 , 2015 - Hitachi, Ltd. ( TSE : 6501 / ' Hitachi ') and ABB, the leading power and automation technology group, today announced the completion of the process to establish a joint venture company, Hitachi ABB
